A second hypothesis use diathermy , compare scalpel increase post-operative pain . 1 . This randomized prospective study woman undergo elective repeat cesarean delivery Medical Center Hospital Odessa Texas . 2 . Women undergo cesarean delivery randomize two group : One group undergo diathermy incise entire abdominal wall , include skin , subcutaneous tissue , rectus muscle peritoneal cavity visible . On group scalpel use achieve aim . 3 . A standardized abdominal wall incision make either diathermy cut mode scalpel . Diathermy set cut mode standard set per surgeon preference . All patient study get standard skin incision term length depth mark ruler . 4 . Incision time ( measure minute second stop watch ) amount bleeding measure .
